title: E-Learning Course Development Strategy Using Heuristic Task Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic e-learning development processes and comprehension of instructional design theories
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration and project development environment utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Enhancing the ability to establish step-by-step strategies for language learning e-courses by applying HTA techniques
Implementing an iterative improvement process of learner analysis-content development-assessment design on a project basis
Deriving and applying three or more customized heuristic principles according to institutional contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
